text: yutarkal kurukirarkal; 'kiristavarkal enta nalvaliyilum illai' enru. Kiristavarkal kurukirarkal; 'yutarkal enta nalvaliyilum illai' enru. Anal, ivarkal (tankalukkuriya) vetattai otikkonte (ippatik kurukirarkal) ivarkal kurum corkalaip polave onrum ariyatavarkalum kurukirarkal; irutittirppu nalil allah ivarkal tarkkittu marupattuk kontirukkum visayattil tirppalippan
